overview: Lene is the featured dancer at a club known as The Blind Spot. Sierra, Lacy, Laurie and Rasha are regulars "around the pole," as are a group of rather strange men. As a matter o' fact, everything about The Blind Spot is strange. Like the sunglasses worn indoors. Like the sleazy club manager, with something to hide. And all the strange obsessions the club seems to generate. Generate an obsession of your own. With The Blind Spot, now open.
title: Blind Spot
